uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.diag

Class Drawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs124.clg11.diag.Drawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassDiag, RelationshipDiag

    public abstract class Drawable
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains all variables and methods which are common to BOTH the Class and Relationship diagrams. Extended from by ClassDiag & RelationshipDiag Stored in VectorOfDrawables
    Author:
    Connor Goddard (clg11), Sam Jackson (???), Craig Hepinsthall (???)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected ObjectData data
      Interface used to store 'Drawable' type objects that are extended/used by ClassDiag & RelationshipDiag.

      protected int y

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double distanceTo(double x, double y)
      Calculates the distance between the position that the user clicks on CanvasPanel, and all 'Drawable' object positions to determine closest class diagram from mouse position.

      • distanceTo

        public double distanceTo(double x,
                double y)
        Calculates the distance between the position that the user clicks on CanvasPanel, and all 'Drawable' object positions to determine closest class diagram from mouse position.
        Parameters:
        x - - X coordinate of mouse after user clicks on the CanvasPanel
        y - - Y coordinate of mouse after user clicks on the CanvasPanel
        Returns:
        Distance between the user's mouse position when clicked, and 'Drawable' object
